unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for acquiring fresh talent. Institutes like IIT Bombay offer exceptional candidates. Early engagement through internships, perhaps starting in May, is beneficial. Pre-placement talks, inspired by films like "3 Idiots," can build rapport. Packages starting at Rs. 7 LPA are competitive. We must visit Tier-2 colleges in smaller cities, even if they are 500 km away. This strategy strengthens our talent pipeline for years to come.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for acquiring fresh talent. Institutes like I I T Bombay offer exceptional candidates. Early engagement through internships, perhaps starting in May, is beneficial. Pre-placement talks, inspired by films like "three Idiots," can build rapport. Packages starting at rupee seven L P A are competitive. We must visit Tier-two colleges in smaller cities, even if they are five hundred kilometer away. This strategy strengthens our talent pipeline for years to come.
